name: 郭政淳
objective: 此課程旨在因應高階英語文學習者的需要，協助他們得到近乎英美人士的語言知識、瞭解真實世界溝通的詞彙使用方式。關乎創新而主流、重複出現的詞彙變化模式。近年來成長迅速的詞彙語用學，探究詞彙的流動性及其基底修辭功能，諸如意義窄化、擴充、演變、偏離、轉換等現象。
schedule:
Week 1　　Orientation / Definitions and background (Yule Ch1)
Week 2　　Deixis and distance (Yule Ch2)
Week 3　　Reference and inference (Yule Ch3)
Week 4　　Presupposition and entailment (Yule Ch4)
Week 5　　Cooperation and implicature (Yule Ch5)
Week 6　　Holiday-No Class (4/3)
Week 7　　Term Project: 1st discussion 
Week 8　　Speech acts and events (Yule Ch6)
Week 9  Politeness and interaction (Yule Ch7)
Week 10　　Conversation and preference structure (Yule Ch8)
Week 11　　Discourse and culture (Yule Ch9) / Term Project: 2nd discussion 
Week 12 Student-led discussion (I): Peccei Ch 2-3 & Case studies  
Week 13　　Student-led discussion (II): Peccei Ch 4-5 & Case studies
Week 14　　Student-led discussion (III) Peccei Ch 6-7 & Case studies
Week 15　　Student-led discussion (IV) Peccei Ch 8-9 & Case studies
Week 16　　Wrap-up / Term Project: 3rd discussion 
Week 17　　Term Project: Oral Presentation
Week 18　　No Class (Term Paper Due)
scorePolicy:
Quizzes: 25%
Student-Led Discussion: 20%
Case Studies: 15%
Term Project: 40% 
     (including progress checkpoints 10%, oral presentation 10%, and term paper 20%)
materials:
Textbook 1  Yule: Pragmatics. Oxford
Textbook 2  Peccei: Pragmatics. Routledge
